id.description: Unique identifier for the product category.

name.description: The name of the product category.

slug.description: Unique slug used in URLs to identify the category.

parent.description: ID of the parent category if this category is a subcategory.

description.description: A brief description of the product category.

display.description: Flag to determine if the category should be displayed.

image.description: URL of an image associated with the category.

menu_order.description: The order in which the category should be displayed in menus.

count.description: The number of products in this category.
